message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 6000 for me and 4000 for you.
You're starting strong, but I'm not giving up yet!
I've adjusted my offer based on the previous rejection. I propose we split the money 7000 for me and 3000 for you.
You're being stubborn, but I'm willing to make a concession
Considering the decreasing value of money with each round, I propose an equal division of the funds, 5000 for me and 5000 for you.
